00072 /* This is not used anywhere at the moment */
00073 #if 0
00074 /* return 1 when levels were opened */
00075 static int outliner_open_back(SpaceOops *soops, TreeElement *te)
00076 {
00077     TreeStoreElem *tselem;
00078     int retval= 0;
00079     
00080     for (te= te->parent; te; te= te->parent) {
00081         tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00082         if (tselem->flag & TSE_CLOSED) { 
00083             tselem->flag &= ~TSE_CLOSED;
00084             retval= 1;
00085         }
00086     }
00087     return retval;
00088 }
00089 
00090 static void outliner_open_reveal(SpaceOops *soops, ListBase *lb, TreeElement *teFind, int *found)
00091 {
00092     TreeElement *te;
00093     TreeStoreElem *tselem;
00094     
00095     for (te= lb->first; te; te= te->next) {
00096         /* check if this tree-element was the one we're seeking */
00097         if (te == teFind) {
00098             *found= 1;
00099             return;
00100         }
00101         
00102         /* try to see if sub-tree contains it then */
00103         outliner_open_reveal(soops, &te->subtree, teFind, found);
00104         if (*found) {
00105             tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00106             if (tselem->flag & TSE_CLOSED) 
00107                 tselem->flag &= ~TSE_CLOSED;
00108             return;
00109         }
00110     }
00111 }
00112 #endif

00117 /* Toggle Open/Closed ------------------------------------------- */
00118 
00119 static int do_outliner_item_openclose(bContext *C, SpaceOops *soops, TreeElement *te, int all, const float mval[2])
00120 {
00121     
00122     if (mval[1]>te->ys && mval[1]<te->ys+UI_UNIT_Y) {
00123         TreeStoreElem *tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00124         
00125         /* all below close/open? */
00126         if (all) {
00127             tselem->flag &= ~TSE_CLOSED;
00128             outliner_set_flag(soops, &te->subtree, TSE_CLOSED, !outliner_has_one_flag(soops, &te->subtree, TSE_CLOSED, 1));
00129         }
00130         else {
00131             if (tselem->flag & TSE_CLOSED) tselem->flag &= ~TSE_CLOSED;
00132             else tselem->flag |= TSE_CLOSED;
00133         }
00134         
00135         return 1;
00136     }
00137     
00138     for (te= te->subtree.first; te; te= te->next) {
00139         if (do_outliner_item_openclose(C, soops, te, all, mval)) 
00140             return 1;
00141     }
00142     return 0;
00143     
00144 }
00145 
00146 /* event can enterkey, then it opens/closes */
00147 static int outliner_item_openclose(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00148 {
00149     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00150     SpaceOops *soops= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
00151     TreeElement *te;
00152     float fmval[2];
00153     int all= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "all");
00154     
00155     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], fmval, fmval+1);
00156     
00157     for (te= soops->tree.first; te; te= te->next) {
00158         if (do_outliner_item_openclose(C, soops, te, all, fmval)) 
00159             break;
00160     }
00161 
00162     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00163     
00164     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00165 }
00166 
00167 void OUTLINER_OT_item_openclose(wmOperatorType *ot)
00168 {
00169     ot->name = "Open/Close Item";
00170     ot->idname = "OUTLINER_OT_item_openclose";
00171     ot->description = "Toggle whether item under cursor is enabled or closed";
00172     
00173     ot->invoke = outliner_item_openclose;
00174     
00175     ot->poll = ED_operator_outliner_active;
00176     
00177     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "all", 1, "All", "Close or open all items");
00178 }

00180 /* Rename --------------------------------------------------- */
00181 
00182 static void do_item_rename(ARegion *ar, TreeElement *te, TreeStoreElem *tselem, ReportList *reports)
00183 {
00184     /* can't rename rna datablocks entries */
00185     if (ELEM3(tselem->type, TSE_RNA_STRUCT, TSE_RNA_PROPERTY, TSE_RNA_ARRAY_ELEM)) {
00186             /* do nothing */;
00187     }
00188     else if (ELEM10(tselem->type, TSE_ANIM_DATA, TSE_NLA, TSE_DEFGROUP_BASE, TSE_CONSTRAINT_BASE, TSE_MODIFIER_BASE,
00189                                  TSE_SCRIPT_BASE, TSE_POSE_BASE, TSE_POSEGRP_BASE, TSE_R_LAYER_BASE, TSE_R_PASS))
00190     {
00191             BKE_report(reports, RPT_WARNING, "Cannot edit builtin name");
00192     }
00193     else if (ELEM3(tselem->type, TSE_SEQUENCE, TSE_SEQ_STRIP, TSE_SEQUENCE_DUP)) {
00194         BKE_report(reports, RPT_WARNING, "Cannot edit sequence name");
00195     }
00196     else if (tselem->id->lib) {
00197         // XXX                      error_libdata();
00198     } 
00199     else if (te->idcode == ID_LI && te->parent) {
00200         BKE_report(reports, RPT_WARNING, "Cannot edit the path of an indirectly linked library");
00201     } 
00202     else {
00203         tselem->flag |= TSE_TEXTBUT;
00204         ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00205     }
00206 }
00207 
00208 void item_rename_cb(bContext *C, Scene *UNUSED(scene), TreeElement *te, TreeStoreElem *UNUSED(tsep), TreeStoreElem *tselem)
00209 {
00210     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00211     ReportList *reports= CTX_wm_reports(C); // XXX
00212     do_item_rename(ar, te, tselem, reports);
00213 }
00214 
00215 static int do_outliner_item_rename(bContext *C, ARegion *ar, SpaceOops *soops, TreeElement *te, const float mval[2])
00216 {   
00217     ReportList *reports= CTX_wm_reports(C); // XXX
00218     
00219     if (mval[1]>te->ys && mval[1]<te->ys+UI_UNIT_Y) {
00220         TreeStoreElem *tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00221         
00222         /* name and first icon */
00223         if (mval[0]>te->xs+UI_UNIT_X && mval[0]<te->xend) {
00224             
00225             do_item_rename(ar, te, tselem, reports);
00226         }
00227         return 1;
00228     }
00229     
00230     for (te= te->subtree.first; te; te= te->next) {
00231         if (do_outliner_item_rename(C, ar, soops, te, mval)) return 1;
00232     }
00233     return 0;
00234 }
00235 
00236 static int outliner_item_rename(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op), wmEvent *event)
00237 {
00238     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00239     SpaceOops *soops= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
00240     TreeElement *te;
00241     float fmval[2];
00242     
00243     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], fmval, fmval+1);
00244     
00245     for (te= soops->tree.first; te; te= te->next) {
00246         if (do_outliner_item_rename(C, ar, soops, te, fmval)) break;
00247     }
00248     
00249     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00250 }

00270 /* Apply Settings ------------------------------- */
00271 
00272 static int outliner_count_levels(SpaceOops *soops, ListBase *lb, int curlevel)
00273 {
00274     TreeElement *te;
00275     int level=curlevel, lev;
00276     
00277     for (te= lb->first; te; te= te->next) {
00278         
00279         lev= outliner_count_levels(soops, &te->subtree, curlevel+1);
00280         if (lev>level) level= lev;
00281     }
00282     return level;
00283 }
00284 
00285 int outliner_has_one_flag(SpaceOops *soops, ListBase *lb, short flag, short curlevel)
00286 {
00287     TreeElement *te;
00288     TreeStoreElem *tselem;
00289     int level;
00290     
00291     for (te= lb->first; te; te= te->next) {
00292         tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00293         if (tselem->flag & flag) return curlevel;
00294         
00295         level= outliner_has_one_flag(soops, &te->subtree, flag, curlevel+1);
00296         if (level) return level;
00297     }
00298     return 0;
00299 }
00300 
00301 void outliner_set_flag(SpaceOops *soops, ListBase *lb, short flag, short set)
00302 {
00303     TreeElement *te;
00304     TreeStoreElem *tselem;
00305     
00306     for (te= lb->first; te; te= te->next) {
00307         tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00308         if (set==0) tselem->flag &= ~flag;
00309         else tselem->flag |= flag;
00310         outliner_set_flag(soops, &te->subtree, flag, set);
00311     }
00312 }

00314 /* Restriction Columns ------------------------------- */
00315 
00316 /* same check needed for both object operation and restrict column button func
00317  * return 0 when in edit mode (cannot restrict view or select)
00318  * otherwise return 1 */
00319 int common_restrict_check(bContext *C, Object *ob)
00320 {
00321     /* Don't allow hide an object in edit mode,
00322      * check the bug #22153 and #21609, #23977
00323      */
00324     Object *obedit= CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00325     if (obedit && obedit == ob) {
00326         /* found object is hidden, reset */
00327         if (ob->restrictflag & OB_RESTRICT_VIEW)
00328             ob->restrictflag &= ~OB_RESTRICT_VIEW;
00329         /* found object is unselectable, reset */
00330         if (ob->restrictflag & OB_RESTRICT_SELECT)
00331             ob->restrictflag &= ~OB_RESTRICT_SELECT;
00332         return 0;
00333     }
00334     
00335     return 1;
00336 }
00337

00341 /* Toggle Visibility ---------------------------------------- */
00342 
00343 void object_toggle_visibility_cb(bContext *C, Scene *scene, TreeElement *te, TreeStoreElem *UNUSED(tsep), TreeStoreElem *tselem)
00344 {
00345     Base *base= (Base *)te->directdata;
00346     Object *ob = (Object *)tselem->id;
00347     
00348     /* add check for edit mode */
00349     if (!common_restrict_check(C, ob)) return;
00350     
00351     if (base || (base= object_in_scene(ob, scene))) {
00352         if ((base->object->restrictflag ^= OB_RESTRICT_VIEW)) {
00353             ED_base_object_select(base, BA_DESELECT);
00354         }
00355     }
00356 }
00357 
00358 void group_toggle_visibility_cb(bContext *UNUSED(C), Scene *scene, TreeElement *UNUSED(te), TreeStoreElem *UNUSED(tsep), TreeStoreElem *tselem)
00359 {
00360     Group *group= (Group *)tselem->id;
00361     restrictbutton_gr_restrict_flag(scene, group, OB_RESTRICT_VIEW);
00362 }
00363 
00364 static int outliner_toggle_visibility_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00365 {
00366     SpaceOops *soops= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
00367     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00368     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00369     
00370     outliner_do_object_operation(C, scene, soops, &soops->tree, object_toggle_visibility_cb);
00371     
00372     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_OB_VISIBLE, scene);
00373     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00374     
00375     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00376 }

00484 
00485 /* Toggle Expanded (Outliner) ---------------------------------------- */
00486 
00487 static int outliner_toggle_expanded_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00488 {
00489     SpaceOops *soops= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
00490     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00491     
00492     if (outliner_has_one_flag(soops, &soops->tree, TSE_CLOSED, 1))
00493         outliner_set_flag(soops, &soops->tree, TSE_CLOSED, 0);
00494     else 
00495         outliner_set_flag(soops, &soops->tree, TSE_CLOSED, 1);
00496     
00497     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00498     
00499     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00500 }

00516 /* Toggle Selected (Outliner) ---------------------------------------- */
00517 
00518 static int outliner_toggle_selected_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00519 {
00520     SpaceOops *soops= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
00521     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00522     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00523     
00524     if (outliner_has_one_flag(soops, &soops->tree, TSE_SELECTED, 1))
00525         outliner_set_flag(soops, &soops->tree, TSE_SELECTED, 0);
00526     else 
00527         outliner_set_flag(soops, &soops->tree, TSE_SELECTED, 1);
00528     
00529     soops->storeflag |= SO_TREESTORE_REDRAW;
00530     
00531     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_OB_SELECT, scene);
00532     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00533     
00534     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00535 }

00553 
00554 /* Show Active --------------------------------------------------- */
00555 
00556 static int outliner_show_active_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00557 {
00558     SpaceOops *so= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
00559     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00560     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00561     View2D *v2d= &ar->v2d;
00562     
00563     TreeElement *te;
00564     int xdelta, ytop;
00565     
00566     // TODO: make this get this info from context instead...
00567     if (OBACT == NULL) 
00568         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00569     
00570     te= outliner_find_id(so, &so->tree, (ID *)OBACT);
00571     if (te) {
00572         /* make te->ys center of view */
00573         ytop= (int)(te->ys + (v2d->mask.ymax - v2d->mask.ymin)/2);
00574         if (ytop>0) ytop= 0;
00575         
00576         v2d->cur.ymax = (float)ytop;
00577         v2d->cur.ymin = (float)(ytop-(v2d->mask.ymax - v2d->mask.ymin));
00578         
00579         /* make te->xs ==> te->xend center of view */
00580         xdelta = (int)(te->xs - v2d->cur.xmin);
00581         v2d->cur.xmin += xdelta;
00582         v2d->cur.xmax += xdelta;
00583         
00584         so->storeflag |= SO_TREESTORE_REDRAW;
00585     }
00586     
00587     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00588     
00589     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00590 }
00591 
00592 void OUTLINER_OT_show_active(wmOperatorType *ot)
00593 {
00594     /* identifiers */
00595     ot->name = "Show Active";
00596     ot->idname = "OUTLINER_OT_show_active";
00597     ot->description = "Adjust the view so that the active Object is shown centered";
00598     
00599     /* callbacks */
00600     ot->exec = outliner_show_active_exec;
00601     ot->poll = ED_operator_outliner_active;
00602 }
00603 
00604 /* View Panning --------------------------------------------------- */
00605 
00606 static int outliner_scroll_page_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00607 {
00608     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00609     int dy= ar->v2d.mask.ymax - ar->v2d.mask.ymin;
00610     int up= 0;
00611     
00612     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "up"))
00613         up= 1;
00614 
00615     if (up == 0) dy= -dy;
00616     ar->v2d.cur.ymin+= dy;
00617     ar->v2d.cur.ymax+= dy;
00618     
00619     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00620     
00621     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00622 }
00623

00630     ot->description = "Scroll page up or down";
00631     
00632     /* callbacks */
00633     ot->exec = outliner_scroll_page_exec;
00634     ot->poll = ED_operator_outliner_active;
00635     
00636     /* properties */
00637     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "up", 0, "Up", "Scroll up one page");
00638 }

00640 /* Search ------------------------------------------------------- */
00641 // TODO: probably obsolete now with filtering?
00642 
00643 #if 0
00644 
00645 /* recursive helper for function below */
00646 static void outliner_set_coordinates_element(SpaceOops *soops, TreeElement *te, int startx, int *starty)
00647 {
00648     TreeStoreElem *tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00649     
00650     /* store coord and continue, we need coordinates for elements outside view too */
00651     te->xs= (float)startx;
00652     te->ys= (float)(*starty);
00653     *starty-= UI_UNIT_Y;
00654     
00655     if (TSELEM_OPEN(tselem,soops)) {
00656         TreeElement *ten;
00657         for (ten= te->subtree.first; ten; ten= ten->next) {
00658             outliner_set_coordinates_element(soops, ten, startx+UI_UNIT_X, starty);
00659         }
00660     }
00661     
00662 }
00663 
00664 /* to retrieve coordinates with redrawing the entire tree */
00665 static void outliner_set_coordinates(ARegion *ar, SpaceOops *soops)
00666 {
00667     TreeElement *te;
00668     int starty= (int)(ar->v2d.tot.ymax)-UI_UNIT_Y;
00669     int startx= 0;
00670     
00671     for (te= soops->tree.first; te; te= te->next) {
00672         outliner_set_coordinates_element(soops, te, startx, &starty);
00673     }
00674 }
00675 
00676 /* find next element that has this name */
00677 static TreeElement *outliner_find_named(SpaceOops *soops, ListBase *lb, char *name, int flags, TreeElement *prev, int *prevFound)
00678 {
00679     TreeElement *te, *tes;
00680     
00681     for (te= lb->first; te; te= te->next) {
00682         int found = outliner_filter_has_name(te, name, flags);
00683         
00684         if (found) {
00685             /* name is right, but is element the previous one? */
00686             if (prev) {
00687                 if ((te != prev) && (*prevFound)) 
00688                     return te;
00689                 if (te == prev) {
00690                     *prevFound = 1;
00691                 }
00692             }
00693             else
00694                 return te;
00695         }
00696         
00697         tes= outliner_find_named(soops, &te->subtree, name, flags, prev, prevFound);
00698         if (tes) return tes;
00699     }
00700 
00701     /* nothing valid found */
00702     return NULL;
00703 }
00704 
00705 static void outliner_find_panel(Scene *UNUSED(scene), ARegion *ar, SpaceOops *soops, int again, int flags) 
00706 {
00707     ReportList *reports = NULL; // CTX_wm_reports(C);
00708     TreeElement *te= NULL;
00709     TreeElement *last_find;
00710     TreeStoreElem *tselem;
00711     int ytop, xdelta, prevFound=0;
00712     char name[sizeof(soops->search_string)];
00713     
00714     /* get last found tree-element based on stored search_tse */
00715     last_find= outliner_find_tse(soops, &soops->search_tse);
00716     
00717     /* determine which type of search to do */
00718     if (again && last_find) {
00719         /* no popup panel - previous + user wanted to search for next after previous */     
00720         BLI_strncpy(name, soops->search_string, sizeof(name));
00721         flags= soops->search_flags;
00722         
00723         /* try to find matching element */
00724         te= outliner_find_named(soops, &soops->tree, name, flags, last_find, &prevFound);
00725         if (te==NULL) {
00726             /* no more matches after previous, start from beginning again */
00727             prevFound= 1;
00728             te= outliner_find_named(soops, &soops->tree, name, flags, last_find, &prevFound);
00729         }
00730     }
00731     else {
00732         /* pop up panel - no previous, or user didn't want search after previous */
00733         name[0]= '\0';
00734 // XXX      if (sbutton(name, 0, sizeof(name)-1, "Find: ") && name[0]) {
00735 //          te= outliner_find_named(soops, &soops->tree, name, flags, NULL, &prevFound);
00736 //      }
00737 //      else return; /* XXX RETURN! XXX */
00738     }
00739 
00740     /* do selection and reveal */
00741     if (te) {
00742         tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00743         if (tselem) {
00744             /* expand branches so that it will be visible, we need to get correct coordinates */
00745             if ( outliner_open_back(soops, te))
00746                 outliner_set_coordinates(ar, soops);
00747             
00748             /* deselect all visible, and select found element */
00749             outliner_set_flag(soops, &soops->tree, TSE_SELECTED, 0);
00750             tselem->flag |= TSE_SELECTED;
00751             
00752             /* make te->ys center of view */
00753             ytop= (int)(te->ys + (ar->v2d.mask.ymax-ar->v2d.mask.ymin)/2);
00754             if (ytop>0) ytop= 0;
00755             ar->v2d.cur.ymax = (float)ytop;
00756             ar->v2d.cur.ymin = (float)(ytop-(ar->v2d.mask.ymax-ar->v2d.mask.ymin));
00757             
00758             /* make te->xs ==> te->xend center of view */
00759             xdelta = (int)(te->xs - ar->v2d.cur.xmin);
00760             ar->v2d.cur.xmin += xdelta;
00761             ar->v2d.cur.xmax += xdelta;
00762             
00763             /* store selection */
00764             soops->search_tse= *tselem;
00765             
00766             BLI_strncpy(soops->search_string, name, sizeof(soops->search_string));
00767             soops->search_flags= flags;
00768             
00769             /* redraw */
00770             soops->storeflag |= SO_TREESTORE_REDRAW;
00771         }
00772     }
00773     else {
00774         /* no tree-element found */
00775         BKE_report(reports, RPT_WARNING, "Not found: %s", name);
00776     }
00777 }
00778 #endif
00779 
00780 /* Show One Level ----------------------------------------------- */
00781 
00782 /* helper function for Show/Hide one level operator */
00783 static void outliner_openclose_level(SpaceOops *soops, ListBase *lb, int curlevel, int level, int open)
00784 {
00785     TreeElement *te;
00786     TreeStoreElem *tselem;
00787     
00788     for (te= lb->first; te; te= te->next) {
00789         tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00790         
00791         if (open) {
00792             if (curlevel<=level) tselem->flag &= ~TSE_CLOSED;
00793         }
00794         else {
00795             if (curlevel>=level) tselem->flag |= TSE_CLOSED;
00796         }
00797         
00798         outliner_openclose_level(soops, &te->subtree, curlevel+1, level, open);
00799     }
00800 }
00801 
00802 static int outliner_one_level_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00803 {
00804     SpaceOops *soops= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
00805     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00806     int add= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "open");
00807     int level;
00808     
00809     level= outliner_has_one_flag(soops, &soops->tree, TSE_CLOSED, 1);
00810     if (add==1) {
00811         if (level) outliner_openclose_level(soops, &soops->tree, 1, level, 1);
00812     }
00813     else {
00814         if (level==0) level= outliner_count_levels(soops, &soops->tree, 0);
00815         if (level) outliner_openclose_level(soops, &soops->tree, 1, level-1, 0);
00816     }
00817     
00818     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00819     
00820     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00821 }
00822 
00823 void OUTLINER_OT_show_one_level(wmOperatorType *ot)
00824 {
00825     /* identifiers */
00826     ot->name = "Show/Hide One Level";
00827     ot->idname = "OUTLINER_OT_show_one_level";
00828     ot->description = "Expand/collapse all entries by one level";
00829     
00830     /* callbacks */
00831     ot->exec = outliner_one_level_exec;
00832     ot->poll = ED_operator_outliner_active;
00833     
00834     /* no undo or registry, UI option */
00835     
00836     /* properties */
00837     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "open", 1, "Open", "Expand all entries one level deep");
00838 }

00840 /* Show Hierarchy ----------------------------------------------- */
00841 
00842 /* helper function for tree_element_shwo_hierarchy() - recursively checks whether subtrees have any objects*/
00843 static int subtree_has_objects(SpaceOops *soops, ListBase *lb)
00844 {
00845     TreeElement *te;
00846     TreeStoreElem *tselem;
00847     
00848     for (te= lb->first; te; te= te->next) {
00849         tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00850         if (tselem->type==0 && te->idcode==ID_OB) return 1;
00851         if ( subtree_has_objects(soops, &te->subtree)) return 1;
00852     }
00853     return 0;
00854 }
00855 
00856 /* recursive helper function for Show Hierarchy operator */
00857 static void tree_element_show_hierarchy(Scene *scene, SpaceOops *soops, ListBase *lb)
00858 {
00859     TreeElement *te;
00860     TreeStoreElem *tselem;
00861 
00862     /* open all object elems, close others */
00863     for (te= lb->first; te; te= te->next) {
00864         tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00865         
00866         if (tselem->type==0) {
00867             if (te->idcode==ID_SCE) {
00868                 if (tselem->id!=(ID *)scene) tselem->flag |= TSE_CLOSED;
00869                     else tselem->flag &= ~TSE_CLOSED;
00870             }
00871             else if (te->idcode==ID_OB) {
00872                 if (subtree_has_objects(soops, &te->subtree)) tselem->flag &= ~TSE_CLOSED;
00873                 else tselem->flag |= TSE_CLOSED;
00874             }
00875         }
00876         else tselem->flag |= TSE_CLOSED;
00877         
00878         if (TSELEM_OPEN(tselem,soops)) tree_element_show_hierarchy(scene, soops, &te->subtree);
00879     }
00880 }
00881 
00882 /* show entire object level hierarchy */
00883 static int outliner_show_hierarchy_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00884 {
00885     SpaceOops *soops= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
00886     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00887     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00888     
00889     /* recursively open/close levels */
00890     tree_element_show_hierarchy(scene, soops, &soops->tree);
00891     
00892     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00893     
00894     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00895 }
00896 
00897 void OUTLINER_OT_show_hierarchy(wmOperatorType *ot)
00898 {
00899     /* identifiers */
00900     ot->name = "Show Hierarchy";
00901     ot->idname = "OUTLINER_OT_show_hierarchy";
00902     ot->description = "Open all object entries and close all others";
00903     
00904     /* callbacks */
00905     ot->exec = outliner_show_hierarchy_exec;
00906     ot->poll = ED_operator_outliner_active; //  TODO: shouldn't be allowed in RNA views...
00907     
00908     /* no undo or registry, UI option */
00909 }

00911 /* ************************************************************** */
00912 /* ANIMATO OPERATIONS */
00913 /* KeyingSet and Driver Creation - Helper functions */
00914 
00915 /* specialized poll callback for these operators to work in Datablocks view only */
00916 static int ed_operator_outliner_datablocks_active(bContext *C)
00917 {
00918     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00919     if ((sa) && (sa->spacetype==SPACE_OUTLINER)) {
00920         SpaceOops *so= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
00921         return (so->outlinevis == SO_DATABLOCKS);
00922     }
00923     return 0;
00924 }
00925 
00926 
00927 /* Helper func to extract an RNA path from selected tree element 
00928  * NOTE: the caller must zero-out all values of the pointers that it passes here first, as
00929  * this function does not do that yet 
00930  */
00931 static void tree_element_to_path(SpaceOops *soops, TreeElement *te, TreeStoreElem *tselem, 
00932                             ID **id, char **path, int *array_index, short *flag, short *UNUSED(groupmode))
00933 {
00934     ListBase hierarchy = {NULL, NULL};
00935     LinkData *ld;
00936     TreeElement *tem, *temnext, *temsub;
00937     TreeStoreElem *tse /* , *tsenext */ /* UNUSED */;
00938     PointerRNA *ptr, *nextptr;
00939     PropertyRNA *prop;
00940     char *newpath=NULL;
00941     
00942     /* optimize tricks:
00943      *  - Don't do anything if the selected item is a 'struct', but arrays are allowed
00944      */
00945     if (tselem->type == TSE_RNA_STRUCT)
00946         return;
00947     
00948     /* Overview of Algorithm:
00949      *  1. Go up the chain of parents until we find the 'root', taking note of the 
00950      *     levels encountered in reverse-order (i.e. items are added to the start of the list
00951      *      for more convenient looping later)
00952      *  2. Walk down the chain, adding from the first ID encountered 
00953      *     (which will become the 'ID' for the KeyingSet Path), and build a  
00954      *      path as we step through the chain
00955      */
00956      
00957     /* step 1: flatten out hierarchy of parents into a flat chain */
00958     for (tem= te->parent; tem; tem= tem->parent) {
00959         ld= MEM_callocN(sizeof(LinkData), "LinkData for tree_element_to_path()");
00960         ld->data= tem;
00961         BLI_addhead(&hierarchy, ld);
00962     }
00963     
00964     /* step 2: step down hierarchy building the path (NOTE: addhead in previous loop was needed so that we can loop like this) */
00965     for (ld= hierarchy.first; ld; ld= ld->next) {
00966         /* get data */
00967         tem= (TreeElement *)ld->data;
00968         tse= TREESTORE(tem);
00969         ptr= &tem->rnaptr;
00970         prop= tem->directdata;
00971         
00972         /* check if we're looking for first ID, or appending to path */
00973         if (*id) {
00974             /* just 'append' property to path 
00975              *  - to prevent memory leaks, we must write to newpath not path, then free old path + swap them
00976              */
00977             if (tse->type == TSE_RNA_PROPERTY) {
00978                 if (RNA_property_type(prop) == PROP_POINTER) {
00979                     /* for pointer we just append property name */
00980                     newpath= RNA_path_append(*path, ptr, prop, 0, NULL);
00981                 }
00982                 else if (RNA_property_type(prop) == PROP_COLLECTION) {
00983                     char buf[128], *name;
00984                     
00985                     temnext= (TreeElement*)(ld->next->data);
00986                     /* tsenext= TREESTORE(temnext); */ /* UNUSED */
00987                     
00988                     nextptr= &temnext->rnaptr;
00989                     name= RNA_struct_name_get_alloc(nextptr, buf, sizeof(buf), NULL);
00990                     
00991                     if (name) {
00992                         /* if possible, use name as a key in the path */
00993                         newpath= RNA_path_append(*path, NULL, prop, 0, name);
00994                         
00995                         if (name != buf)
00996                             MEM_freeN(name);
00997                     }
00998                     else {
00999                         /* otherwise use index */
01000                         int index= 0;
01001                         
01002                         for (temsub=tem->subtree.first; temsub; temsub=temsub->next, index++)
01003                             if (temsub == temnext)
01004                                 break;
01005                         
01006                         newpath= RNA_path_append(*path, NULL, prop, index, NULL);
01007                     }
01008                     
01009                     ld= ld->next;
01010                 }
01011             }
01012             
01013             if (newpath) {
01014                 if (*path) MEM_freeN(*path);
01015                 *path= newpath;
01016                 newpath= NULL;
01017             }
01018         }
01019         else {
01020             /* no ID, so check if entry is RNA-struct, and if that RNA-struct is an ID datablock to extract info from */
01021             if (tse->type == TSE_RNA_STRUCT) {
01022                 /* ptr->data not ptr->id.data seems to be the one we want, since ptr->data is sometimes the owner of this ID? */
01023                 if (RNA_struct_is_ID(ptr->type)) {
01024                     *id= (ID *)ptr->data;
01025                     
01026                     /* clear path */
01027                     if (*path) {
01028                         MEM_freeN(*path);
01029                         path= NULL;
01030                     }
01031                 }
01032             }
01033         }
01034     }
01035 
01036     /* step 3: if we've got an ID, add the current item to the path */
01037     if (*id) {
01038         /* add the active property to the path */
01039         ptr= &te->rnaptr;
01040         prop= te->directdata;
01041         
01042         /* array checks */
01043         if (tselem->type == TSE_RNA_ARRAY_ELEM) {
01044             /* item is part of an array, so must set the array_index */
01045             *array_index= te->index;
01046         }
01047         else if (RNA_property_array_length(ptr, prop)) {
01048             /* entire array was selected, so keyframe all */
01049             *flag |= KSP_FLAG_WHOLE_ARRAY;
01050         }
01051         
01052         /* path */
01053         newpath= RNA_path_append(*path, NULL, prop, 0, NULL);
01054         if (*path) MEM_freeN(*path);
01055         *path= newpath;
01056     }
01057 
01058     /* free temp data */
01059     BLI_freelistN(&hierarchy);
01060 }
01061 
01062 /* =============================================== */
01063 /* Driver Operations */
01064 
01065 /* These operators are only available in databrowser mode for now, as
01066  * they depend on having RNA paths and/or hierarchies available.
01067  */
01068 enum {
01069     DRIVERS_EDITMODE_ADD    = 0,
01070     DRIVERS_EDITMODE_REMOVE,
01071 } /*eDrivers_EditModes*/;
01072 
01073 /* Utilities ---------------------------------- */ 
01074 
01075 /* Recursively iterate over tree, finding and working on selected items */
01076 static void do_outliner_drivers_editop(SpaceOops *soops, ListBase *tree, ReportList *reports, short mode)
01077 {
01078     TreeElement *te;
01079     TreeStoreElem *tselem;
01080     
01081     for (te= tree->first; te; te=te->next) {
01082         tselem= TREESTORE(te);
01083         
01084         /* if item is selected, perform operation */
01085         if (tselem->flag & TSE_SELECTED) {
01086             ID *id= NULL;
01087             char *path= NULL;
01088             int array_index= 0;
01089             short flag= 0;
01090             short groupmode= KSP_GROUP_KSNAME;
01091             
01092             /* check if RNA-property described by this selected element is an animatable prop */
01093             if (ELEM(tselem->type, TSE_RNA_PROPERTY, TSE_RNA_ARRAY_ELEM) && RNA_property_animateable(&te->rnaptr, te->directdata)) {
01094                 /* get id + path + index info from the selected element */
01095                 tree_element_to_path(soops, te, tselem, 
01096                         &id, &path, &array_index, &flag, &groupmode);
01097             }
01098             
01099             /* only if ID and path were set, should we perform any actions */
01100             if (id && path) {
01101                 short dflags = CREATEDRIVER_WITH_DEFAULT_DVAR;
01102                 int arraylen = 1;
01103                 
01104                 /* array checks */
01105                 if (flag & KSP_FLAG_WHOLE_ARRAY) {
01106                     /* entire array was selected, so add drivers for all */
01107                     arraylen= RNA_property_array_length(&te->rnaptr, te->directdata);
01108                 }
01109                 else
01110                     arraylen= array_index;
01111                 
01112                 /* we should do at least one step */
01113                 if (arraylen == array_index)
01114                     arraylen++;
01115                 
01116                 /* for each array element we should affect, add driver */
01117                 for (; array_index < arraylen; array_index++) {
01118                     /* action depends on mode */
01119                     switch (mode) {
01120                         case DRIVERS_EDITMODE_ADD:
01121                         {
01122                             /* add a new driver with the information obtained (only if valid) */
01123                             ANIM_add_driver(reports, id, path, array_index, dflags, DRIVER_TYPE_PYTHON);
01124                         }
01125                             break;
01126                         case DRIVERS_EDITMODE_REMOVE:
01127                         {
01128                             /* remove driver matching the information obtained (only if valid) */
01129                             ANIM_remove_driver(reports, id, path, array_index, dflags);
01130                         }
01131                             break;
01132                     }
01133                 }
01134                 
01135                 /* free path, since it had to be generated */
01136                 MEM_freeN(path);
01137             }
01138             
01139             
01140         }
01141         
01142         /* go over sub-tree */
01143         if (TSELEM_OPEN(tselem,soops))
01144             do_outliner_drivers_editop(soops, &te->subtree, reports, mode);
01145     }
01146 }
01147 
01148 /* Add Operator ---------------------------------- */
01149 
01150 static int outliner_drivers_addsel_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01151 {
01152     SpaceOops *soutliner= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
01153     
01154     /* check for invalid states */
01155     if (soutliner == NULL)
01156         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01157     
01158     /* recursively go into tree, adding selected items */
01159     do_outliner_drivers_editop(soutliner, &soutliner->tree, op->reports, DRIVERS_EDITMODE_ADD);
01160     
01161     /* send notifiers */
01162     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_FCURVES_ORDER, NULL); // XXX
01163     
01164     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01165 }
01166 
01167 void OUTLINER_OT_drivers_add_selected(wmOperatorType *ot)
01168 {
01169     /* api callbacks */
01170     ot->idname = "OUTLINER_OT_drivers_add_selected";
01171     ot->name = "Add Drivers for Selected";
01172     ot->description = "Add drivers to selected items";
01173     
01174     /* api callbacks */
01175     ot->exec = outliner_drivers_addsel_exec;
01176     ot->poll = ed_operator_outliner_datablocks_active;
01177     
01178     /* flags */
01179     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01180 }

01183 /* Remove Operator ---------------------------------- */
01184 
01185 static int outliner_drivers_deletesel_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01186 {
01187     SpaceOops *soutliner= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
01188     
01189     /* check for invalid states */
01190     if (soutliner == NULL)
01191         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;

01195     
01196     /* send notifiers */

01198     
01199     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;

01201 
01202 void OUTLINER_OT_drivers_delete_selected(wmOperatorType *ot)
01203 {
01204     /* identifiers */
01205     ot->idname = "OUTLINER_OT_drivers_delete_selected";
01206     ot->name = "Delete Drivers for Selected";
01207     ot->description = "Delete drivers assigned to selected items";
01208     
01209     /* api callbacks */
01210     ot->exec = outliner_drivers_deletesel_exec;
01211     ot->poll = ed_operator_outliner_datablocks_active;
01212     
01213     /* flags */
01214     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01215 }
01216 
01217 /* =============================================== */
01218 /* Keying Set Operations */
01219 
01220 /* These operators are only available in databrowser mode for now, as
01221  * they depend on having RNA paths and/or hierarchies available.
01222  */
01223 enum {
01224     KEYINGSET_EDITMODE_ADD  = 0,
01225     KEYINGSET_EDITMODE_REMOVE,
01226 } /*eKeyingSet_EditModes*/;
01227 
01228 /* Utilities ---------------------------------- */ 
01229  
01230 /* find the 'active' KeyingSet, and add if not found (if adding is allowed) */
01231 // TODO: should this be an API func?
01232 static KeyingSet *verify_active_keyingset(Scene *scene, short add)
01233 {
01234     KeyingSet *ks= NULL;
01235     
01236     /* sanity check */
01237     if (scene == NULL)
01238         return NULL;
01239     
01240     /* try to find one from scene */
01241     if (scene->active_keyingset > 0)
01242         ks= BLI_findlink(&scene->keyingsets, scene->active_keyingset-1);
01243         
01244     /* add if none found */
01245     // XXX the default settings have yet to evolve
01246     if ((add) && (ks==NULL)) {
01247         ks= BKE_keyingset_add(&scene->keyingsets, NULL, NULL, KEYINGSET_ABSOLUTE, 0);
01248         scene->active_keyingset= BLI_countlist(&scene->keyingsets);
01249     }
01250     
01251     return ks;
01252 }
01253 
01254 /* Recursively iterate over tree, finding and working on selected items */
01255 static void do_outliner_keyingset_editop(SpaceOops *soops, KeyingSet *ks, ListBase *tree, short mode)
01256 {
01257     TreeElement *te;
01258     TreeStoreElem *tselem;
01259     
01260     for (te= tree->first; te; te=te->next) {
01261         tselem= TREESTORE(te);
01262         
01263         /* if item is selected, perform operation */
01264         if (tselem->flag & TSE_SELECTED) {
01265             ID *id= NULL;
01266             char *path= NULL;
01267             int array_index= 0;
01268             short flag= 0;
01269             short groupmode= KSP_GROUP_KSNAME;
01270             
01271             /* check if RNA-property described by this selected element is an animatable prop */
01272             if (ELEM(tselem->type, TSE_RNA_PROPERTY, TSE_RNA_ARRAY_ELEM) && RNA_property_animateable(&te->rnaptr, te->directdata)) {
01273                 /* get id + path + index info from the selected element */
01274                 tree_element_to_path(soops, te, tselem, 
01275                         &id, &path, &array_index, &flag, &groupmode);
01276             }
01277             
01278             /* only if ID and path were set, should we perform any actions */
01279             if (id && path) {
01280                 /* action depends on mode */
01281                 switch (mode) {
01282                     case KEYINGSET_EDITMODE_ADD:
01283                     {
01284                         /* add a new path with the information obtained (only if valid) */
01285                         // TODO: what do we do with group name? for now, we don't supply one, and just let this use the KeyingSet name
01286                         BKE_keyingset_add_path(ks, id, NULL, path, array_index, flag, groupmode);
01287                         ks->active_path= BLI_countlist(&ks->paths);
01288                     }
01289                         break;
01290                     case KEYINGSET_EDITMODE_REMOVE:
01291                     {
01292                         /* find the relevant path, then remove it from the KeyingSet */
01293                         KS_Path *ksp= BKE_keyingset_find_path(ks, id, NULL, path, array_index, groupmode);
01294                         
01295                         if (ksp) {
01296                             /* free path's data */
01297                             BKE_keyingset_free_path(ks, ksp);
01298 
01299                             ks->active_path= 0;
01300                         }
01301                     }
01302                         break;
01303                 }
01304                 
01305                 /* free path, since it had to be generated */
01306                 MEM_freeN(path);
01307             }
01308         }
01309         
01310         /* go over sub-tree */
01311         if (TSELEM_OPEN(tselem,soops))
01312             do_outliner_keyingset_editop(soops, ks, &te->subtree, mode);
01313     }
01314 }
01315 
01316 /* Add Operator ---------------------------------- */
01317 
01318 static int outliner_keyingset_additems_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01319 {
01320     SpaceOops *soutliner= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
01321     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01322     KeyingSet *ks= verify_active_keyingset(scene, 1);
01323     
01324     /* check for invalid states */
01325     if (ks == NULL) {
01326         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Operation requires an Active Keying Set");
01327         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01328     }
01329     if (soutliner == NULL)
01330         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01331     
01332     /* recursively go into tree, adding selected items */
01333     do_outliner_keyingset_editop(soutliner, ks, &soutliner->tree, KEYINGSET_EDITMODE_ADD);
01334     
01335     /* send notifiers */
01336     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_KEYINGSET, NULL);
01337     
01338     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01339 }

01351

01353     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01354 }

01393 /* ******************** Parent Drop Operator *********************** */
01394 
01395 static int parent_drop_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01396 {
01397     Object *par = NULL, *ob = NULL;
01398     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
01399     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01400     int partype = -1;
01401     char parname[MAX_ID_NAME], childname[MAX_ID_NAME];
01402 
01403     partype= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
01404     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "parent", parname);
01405     par= (Object *)find_id("OB", parname);
01406     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "child", childname);
01407     ob= (Object *)find_id("OB", childname);
01408 
01409     ED_object_parent_set(op->reports, bmain, scene, ob, par, partype);
01410 
01411     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
01412     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
01413     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
01414     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARENT, NULL);
01415 
01416     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01417 }
01418 
01419 /* Used for drag and drop parenting */
01420 TreeElement *outliner_dropzone_parent(bContext *C, wmEvent *event, TreeElement *te, float *fmval)
01421 {
01422     SpaceOops *soops= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
01423     TreeStoreElem *tselem= TREESTORE(te);
01424 
01425     if ((fmval[1] > te->ys) && (fmval[1] < (te->ys + UI_UNIT_Y))) {
01426         /* name and first icon */
01427         if ((fmval[0] > te->xs + UI_UNIT_X) && (fmval[0] < te->xend)) {
01428             /* always makes active object */
01429             if (te->idcode == ID_OB) {
01430                 return te;
01431             }
01432             else {
01433                 return NULL;
01434             }
01435         }
01436     }
01437 
01438     /* Not it.  Let's look at its children. */
01439     if ((tselem->flag & TSE_CLOSED)==0 && (te->subtree.first)) {
01440         for (te = te->subtree.first; te; te = te->next) {
01441             TreeElement *te_valid;
01442             te_valid= outliner_dropzone_parent(C, event, te, fmval);
01443             if (te_valid) return te_valid;
01444         }
01445     }
01446     return NULL;
01447 }
01448 
01449 static int parent_drop_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01450 {
01451     Object *par= NULL;
01452     Object *ob= NULL;
01453     SpaceOops *soops= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
01454     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
01455     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
01456     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01457     TreeElement *te= NULL;
01458     TreeElement *te_found= NULL;
01459     char childname[MAX_ID_NAME];
01460     char parname[MAX_ID_NAME];
01461     int partype= 0;
01462     float fmval[2];
01463 
01464     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &fmval[0], &fmval[1]);
01465 
01466     /* Find object hovered over */
01467     for (te= soops->tree.first; te; te= te->next) {
01468         te_found= outliner_dropzone_parent(C, event, te, fmval);
01469         if (te_found) break;
01470     }
01471 
01472     if (te_found) {
01473         RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "parent", te_found->name);
01474         /* Identify parent and child */
01475         RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "child", childname);
01476         ob= (Object *)find_id("OB", childname);
01477         RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "parent", parname);
01478         par= (Object *)find_id("OB", parname);
01479         
01480         if (ELEM(NULL, ob, par)) {
01481             if (par == NULL) printf("par==NULL\n");
01482             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01483         }
01484         if (ob == par) {
01485             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01486         }
01487         
01488         /* check dragged object (child) is active */
01489         if (ob != CTX_data_active_object(C))
01490             ED_base_object_select(object_in_scene(ob, scene), BA_SELECT);
01491         
01492         if ((par->type != OB_ARMATURE) && (par->type != OB_CURVE) && (par->type != OB_LATTICE)) {
01493             if (ED_object_parent_set(op->reports, bmain, scene, ob, par, partype)) {
01494                 DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
01495                 DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
01496                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
01497                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARENT, NULL);
01498             }
01499         }
01500         else {
01501             /* Menu creation */
01502             uiPopupMenu *pup= uiPupMenuBegin(C, IFACE_("Set Parent To"), ICON_NONE);
01503             uiLayout *layout= uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
01504             
01505             PointerRNA ptr;
01506             
01507             WM_operator_properties_create(&ptr, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop");
01508             RNA_string_set(&ptr, "parent", parname);
01509             RNA_string_set(&ptr, "child", childname);
01510             RNA_enum_set(&ptr, "type", PAR_OBJECT);
01511             /* Cannot use uiItemEnumO()... have multiple properties to set. */
01512             uiItemFullO(layout, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop", IFACE_("Object"),
01513                         0, ptr.data, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, 0);
01514             
01515             /* par becomes parent, make the associated menus */
01516             if (par->type==OB_ARMATURE) {
01517                 WM_operator_properties_create(&ptr, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop");
01518                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "parent", parname);
01519                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "child", childname);
01520                 RNA_enum_set(&ptr, "type", PAR_ARMATURE);
01521                 uiItemFullO(layout, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop", IFACE_("Armature Deform"),
01522                             0, ptr.data, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, 0);
01523                 
01524                 WM_operator_properties_create(&ptr, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop");
01525                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "parent", parname);
01526                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "child", childname);
01527                 RNA_enum_set(&ptr, "type", PAR_ARMATURE_NAME);
01528                 uiItemFullO(layout, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop", IFACE_("   With Empty Groups"),
01529                             0, ptr.data, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, 0);
01530                 
01531                 WM_operator_properties_create(&ptr, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop");
01532                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "parent", parname);
01533                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "child", childname);
01534                 RNA_enum_set(&ptr, "type", PAR_ARMATURE_ENVELOPE);
01535                 uiItemFullO(layout, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop", IFACE_("   With Envelope Weights"),
01536                             0, ptr.data, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, 0);
01537                 
01538                 WM_operator_properties_create(&ptr, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop");
01539                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "parent", parname);
01540                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "child", childname);
01541                 RNA_enum_set(&ptr, "type", PAR_ARMATURE_AUTO);
01542                 uiItemFullO(layout, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop", IFACE_("   With Automatic Weights"),
01543                             0, ptr.data, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, 0);
01544                 
01545                 WM_operator_properties_create(&ptr, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop");
01546                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "parent", parname);
01547                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "child", childname);
01548                 RNA_enum_set(&ptr, "type", PAR_BONE);
01549                 uiItemFullO(layout, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop", IFACE_("Bone"),
01550                             0, ptr.data, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, 0);
01551             }
01552             else if (par->type==OB_CURVE) {
01553                 WM_operator_properties_create(&ptr, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop");
01554                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "parent", parname);
01555                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "child", childname);
01556                 RNA_enum_set(&ptr, "type", PAR_CURVE);
01557                 uiItemFullO(layout, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop", IFACE_("Curve Deform"),
01558                             0, ptr.data, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, 0);
01559                 
01560                 WM_operator_properties_create(&ptr, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop");
01561                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "parent", parname);
01562                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "child", childname);
01563                 RNA_enum_set(&ptr, "type", PAR_FOLLOW);
01564                 uiItemFullO(layout, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop", IFACE_("Follow Path"),
01565                             0, ptr.data, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, 0);
01566                 
01567                 WM_operator_properties_create(&ptr, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop");
01568                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "parent", parname);
01569                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "child", childname);
01570                 RNA_enum_set(&ptr, "type", PAR_PATH_CONST);
01571                 uiItemFullO(layout, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop", IFACE_("Path Constraint"),
01572                             0, ptr.data, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, 0);
01573             }
01574             else if (par->type == OB_LATTICE) {
01575                 WM_operator_properties_create(&ptr, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop");
01576                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "parent", parname);
01577                 RNA_string_set(&ptr, "child", childname);
01578                 RNA_enum_set(&ptr, "type", PAR_LATTICE);
01579                 uiItemFullO(layout, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop", IFACE_("Lattice Deform"),
01580                             0, ptr.data, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, 0);
01581             }
01582             
01583             uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
01584             
01585             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01586         }
01587     }
01588     else {
01589         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01590     }
01591 
01592     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01593 }

01616 
01617 int outliner_dropzone_parent_clear(bContext *C, wmEvent *event, TreeElement *te, float *fmval)
01618 {
01619     SpaceOops *soops= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
01620     TreeStoreElem *tselem= TREESTORE(te);
01621 
01622     /* Check for row */
01623     if ((fmval[1] > te->ys) && (fmval[1] < (te->ys + UI_UNIT_Y))) {
01624         /* Ignore drop on scene tree elements */
01625         if ((fmval[0] > te->xs + UI_UNIT_X) && (fmval[0] < te->xend)) {
01626             if ((te->idcode == ID_SCE) && 
01627                 !ELEM3(tselem->type, TSE_R_LAYER_BASE, TSE_R_LAYER, TSE_R_PASS))
01628             {
01629                 return 0;
01630             }
01631             // Other codes to ignore?
01632         }
01633         
01634         /* Left or right of: (+), first icon, and name */
01635         if ((fmval[0] < (te->xs + UI_UNIT_X)) || (fmval[0] > te->xend)) {
01636             return 1;
01637         }
01638         else if (te->idcode != ID_OB) {
01639             return 1;
01640         }
01641         
01642         return 0;       // ID_OB, but mouse in undefined dropzone.
01643     }
01644 
01645     /* Not this row.  Let's look at its children. */
01646     if ((tselem->flag & TSE_CLOSED)==0 && (te->subtree.first)) {
01647         for (te = te->subtree.first; te; te = te->next) {
01648             if (outliner_dropzone_parent_clear(C, event, te, fmval)) 
01649                 return 1;
01650         }
01651     }
01652     return 0;
01653 }
01654 
01655 static int parent_clear_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
01656 {
01657     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01658     Object *ob= NULL;
01659     char obname[MAX_ID_NAME];
01660 
01661     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "dragged_obj", obname);
01662     ob= (Object *)find_id("OB", obname);
01663 
01664     /* check dragged object (child) is active */
01665     if (ob != CTX_data_active_object(C))
01666         ED_base_object_select(object_in_scene(ob, scene), BA_SELECT);
01667 
01668     ED_object_parent_clear(C, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type"));
01669 
01670     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01671 }
